name: Cubet Techno Labs Pvt Ltd
tagline: Architecting your Digital Dreams to Perfection
description:
Founded in 2007, Cubet Techno Labs is a full-service, full-stack digital agency, providing end to end solution that helps the organization drive forward. We are also an exclusive Laravel partner in Asia & Oceania, with offices at Kochi, India and London, UK.
We are known for our full-stack, full-service digital development, with dedicated experts that have helped hundreds of mid and large size organizations in launching new products; improving productivity; reducing operational costs and increasing revenue. We design and create amazing, highly usable experiences. We ensure and understand your requirements, then meet or exceed your needs, on budget & on time.
Key Capabilities:
Web and Mobile application development
Digital Transformation from legacy systems
Cloud/Big Data/DevOps Services
Enterprise Mobility Solutions(Native iOS/Android/Hybrid)
Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence
IoT applications & platforms
UI/UX design & Development
Technology consulting & platform architecture consulting.
Key Sectors:
Enterprise Solutions
Healthcare & Fitness
E-commerce
Startups
Productivity Apps
Social Media & Creative Apps
Key Skills:
Laravel, Node.js, Meteor, Python;
React.js, Angular, Vue.js;
AWS, IBM Watson, Hyperledger;
Mobile: iOS, Android, React Native;
Partnerships:
We are official partners of Laravel, AWS & Meteor.
